metadata.description: Matrix company that hosts software and services that have one goal in common: to offer useful and high quality services to the masses.

aboutus.title: About us
aboutus.description: SDL Platforms stands as a beacon at the forefront of technological innovation. Our team embodies a culture fueled by boundless creativity, unwavering collaboration, and an insatiable hunger for excellence.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We embrace change and continuously seek new ways to improve and evolve. Innovation is in our DNA, and we encourage bold ideas and experimentation.

empowerment.title: Empowerment
empowerment.description: We empower our users by providing intuitive, user-friendly solutions. Whether it’s through our web, mobile or desktop applications, we aim to make technology accessible to all.

community.title: Community
community.description: We recognize that our success is intertwined with the success of our community. We actively engage with users, partners, and stakeholders to build lasting relationships.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: We are committed to responsible practices. Our digital services prioritize efficiency, security, and environmental consciousness.

thimsmarket.name: Thims Market
thimsmarket.description: Thims Market is the ultimate marketplace where web designers and developers connect to share, sell, and discover exceptional website templates for NextJS, fostering a thriving community that unlocks new revenue streams and creative opportunities.

one.title: Visibility and Reach
one.description: We offer quality content to a wide and diverse audience of people interested in website creation.

two.title: Community and Feedback
two.description: Everyone can become part of an active community of designers and developers.

three.title: Sustainable Business Model
three.description: We have a shared income structure that motivates creators to create high-quality website templates.

globalvpn.name: GlobalVPN
globalvpn.description: GlobalVPN is your premier choice for online privacy and unrestricted internet access. With servers in over 50 countries, our VPN service ensures that your online activities are secure, private, and free from geographical restrictions.

one.title: Worldwide Server Network
one.description: Enjoy a vast selection of servers across the globe, allowing you to connect from virtually anywhere to anywhere.

two.title: Military-Grade Encryption
two.description: We use the strongest encryption protocols to protect your data, ensuring that your online presence is shielded from prying eyes.

three.title: No Logs Policy
three.description: Your privacy is our priority. We do not track or store any of your online activities, giving you complete peace of mind.

cloudstorage.name: CloudStorage
cloudstorage.description: CloudStorage is the ultimate solution for your digital storage needs, offering a seamless blend of security, accessibility, and convenience. With CloudStorage, you can rest assured that your data is protected and available whenever you need it.

one.title: Unmatched Security
one.description: Our state-of-the-art encryption ensures that your files are always protected. With end-to-end encryption, your data is secure from the moment you upload it until you access it.

two.title: Anywhere Access
two.description: Access your files from any device, anywhere in the world. Whether you’re on a phone, tablet, or computer, your data is just a click away.

three.title: Effortless Sharing
three.description: Share files and folders with colleagues, friends, and family with ease. Set permissions and share links securely, knowing that only the intended recipients can access your data.
